Mal then came up with an idea, Mal remembered all the times that she had witnessed a lot of girls on the isle were punished with diapers whether they had noticeable bulges in their pants from the bulkiness or had nothing covering the diaper. a lot of diapers were often shipped over on the delivery boat since most villains have multiple kids(one example being that little Dizzy is the youngest of 7 daughters of Drizella).

Ruby wears diapers, she has worn them for as long as she could remember. she used to be a waitress at her Granny's diner but because she always wore revealing outfits that her granny hated, the old lady had said if she didn't start wearing more appropriate clothes Ruby would be in diapers and treated like a baby.


Ruby just scoffed and wore yet another revealing outfit the next day resulting in Granny dragging Ruby into the bathroom, given 20 bare bottom spanks finishing with Ruby being placed into a childish diaper with Dora the explorer printed on the front. Ruby was then taken out of the bathroom without her pants exposing her diaper to everyone in the Diner.


Ruby was then taken to a table that had Ashley sitting at it. it was then explained to Ruby that since she is to be treated like a baby from now on she would no longer be working at the Diner, she would need someone to babysit her while granny was working. Ashley went on to explain that as per widow Lucas(Granny's) instructions that Ruby would only be allowed to use her diaper if she needed to go "potty" and would only be allowed in the bathroom when given a bath.

Ruby had been in diapers ever since and because storybrooke was a small town, everyone in town had taken to treating Ruby like she was 2 year's old and Ruby's clothes were sold and replaced with baby clothes that were in her size(all red of course) and all but baby shows on tv had been blocked.

154112.content:
It was late afternoon at the Price house. The golden hour hit the windows, bathing the room in a warm glow that set the scene perfectly.

Childhood friends Maxine Caulfield and Chloe Price were spending time together like they have been for months, but for half that time, they would spend Friday nights together like the sleepovers of heir youth. While they would spend their nights like typical girls reaching womanhood, Fridays became a special night.

Max and Chloe were sharing Chloe's bed. Chloe forgone the usual rock music in-favor the silence of the afternoon. Her mom was working overtime at the diner and step-douche was out too, leaving the two of them alone together.

Max let herself go limp in her friend's arms, relaxing in Chloe's embrace as she mindlessly suckled in her friend's nipple. With her free hand, Chloe reached over and cupped Max's underwear. Unobstructed by her jeans, Max's underwear was free for view, the white of its thick padding now swollen with yellow.

"It looks like this baby girl has had a little too much to drink."

Max fought her instincts to cover herself (her face, her underwear, her entire body) in shame and she tried to fold her legs, made difficult by her thick undies. Chloe wasn't producing any milk obviously. She was a woman in her late teens and out of all of the many irresponsible things she's ever done, getting knocked up wasn't one of them. She has no intention of having kids, especially when she was perfectly content with taking care of one baby girl in particular.

Seeing her childhood sister from another mother after years of silence was certainly a surprise, it came at the most unusual times.

Chloe was threatening to out Nathan for his drug pedaling, only to receive a bullet in her stomach for the trouble. She was certain she was going to die when she woke up in the hospital. While the bullet missed anything that would have caused her massive problems, Max was able to keep her from bleeding out before her step-dad cuffed Nathan and the ambulance came to take her away. After weeks of check-ups, physical therapy and a new prescription of over-the-counter painkillers, Chloe was good and ready to see the world.

Tracking Max down at the school was not difficult, but even as someone as self-centered as Chloe could tell that Max was not okay. She seemed to be in a perpetual funk, wandering the halls and going about her day as though she was the one with a brush with death. It took Max two weeks before she broke down crying in her arms, saying how she has been struggling to sleep and even started wetting the bed. She didn't feel comfortable telling her why, but seeing her friend like this made want to take a gun and hunt down whoever or whatever did this to the person that saved her life.

One thing led to another, and they began to role-play. Max played the role of the baby to escape to a more innocent time where she didn't have to face her depression. Chloe played the role of her mom. It gave her a reason to care. Made her feel responsible.

Chloe never really found out what made Max so in-shock, but she at least figured out how to help bring her out of her shell.
154112.title: Mommy Chloe and Baby Max

info.description:
Hello Everyone! Through request I have made a female version of my Days As A Diaper Boy. In this story you can diaper any female character from shows, movies, comics ect. and even create your own characters to diaper.

Rules:

No Sex: I have rated this story 13+ so please don't include any explicit sex scenes. You can imply it happened but don't go into detail about it.

Females only: This is more to keep starting options down since what happens is that lots of people add character options but never actually go through with them. Males in diapers can appear but they can't be the focus. A male version of this story can be found here: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2142178-Days-As-A-Diaper-Boy

Have fun: Pretty self-explanatory and it is why we're all here after all.
